description: This report represents the unduplicated number of children with an active Individualized Family Service Plan (IFSP) in place based on the State’s child count date, according to the child’s age and primary settings.

heading.template: There are {{var_1}} children receiving early intervention services in your state.

body.template: In the reported data, the Setting categories in your State are distributed as, {{setting}} ({{setting.percentage}}), {{setting-two}} ({{setting-two.percentage}}), and {{setting-three}} ({{setting-three.percentage}}).

In the reported data, the top three Race/Ethnicity categories receiving Early Intervention services in your State are {{ethnicity}} ({{ethnicity.percentage}}), {{ethnicity-two}} ({{ethnicity-two.percentage}}), {{ethnicity-three}} ({{ethnicity-three.percentage}}).
In the reported data, the Gender categories receiving Early Intervention services in your State are distributed as, {{gender}} ({{gender.percentage}}), and {{gender-two}} ({{gender-two.percentage}}).

content.body: This section represents the number of children, ages birth through 3 or older, with an active Individualized Family Service Plan (IFSP) in place on the child count date, according to the child’s age and primary settings.
content.text: Child Count and Settings by Age
